thread.title: Ex-Marex and CQS execs launch online research market
thread.title_full: Ex-Marex and CQS execs launch online research market

author: Financial News
title: Ex-Marex and CQS execs launch online research market
text:
Ex-Marex and CQS execs launch online research market By James Rundle 21 September 2015 Two former buyside and sellside executiveshave teamed up to launch an online marketplace for institutional research, one of a number of new initiatives aiming to capitalise on an overhaul of the way investors pay for broker analysis in Europe.
